name: Compunnel Technology India Pvt. Ltd.
description: Compunnel Inc. is a leading provider of bespoke workforce management, IT consulting, and e-learning solutions tailored to transform your business for the digital age. Ranked by SIA amongst the Largest Staffing Firms in the US, we offer the whole gamut of workforce solutions including contingent staffing, full-time hiring, payroll, and SOW services.

Headline: Unbox new opportunities with Compunnel
ShortDescription: At Compunnel, we pride ourselves on being digital natives with deep-rooted empathy who leverage technology to maximize the impact of human expertise.
enhanced_description: Compunnel Technology India Pvt. Ltd. (Compunnel Inc. in the US) is a leading provider of bespoke workforce management, IT consulting, and e-learning solutions. They offer a comprehensive portfolio of workforce solutions, including contingent staffing, full-time hiring, payroll, and Statement of Work (SOW) services, aimed at transforming businesses for the digital age. Compunnel leverages smart technology to pioneer game-changing solutions, utilizing previous data, to maximize the impact of human expertise and achieve business objectives like faster and more efficient talent acquisition and accelerated skill development. They have been recognized by SIA among the Largest Staffing Firms in the US.
